name: Dynasty Warriors Series Collection Volume 2
synopsis: {{Collection|Japanese editions of [[Dynasty Warriors 4: Empires]] (Shin Sangoku Musou 3 Empires), [[Dynasty Warriors 5]] (Shin Sangoku Musou 4), [[Dynasty Warriors 5: Xtreme Legends]] (Shin Sangoku Musou 4 Moushouden) and [[Dynasty Warriors 5 Empires]] (Shin Sangoku Musou 4 Empires). The package also includes a CD with save data collection and a poster.}}
